<h3 id="X38227">X(38227) = CENTROID OF TRIANGLE {X(4), X(15), X(16)}</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; a^8-4*(b^2+c^2)*a^6+(2*b^2-3*b*c+2*c^2)*(2*b^2+3*b*c+2*c^2)*a^4-2*(b^4-c^4)*(b^2-c^2)*a^2+(b^4-b^2*c^2+c^4)*(b^2-c^2)^2  :  :

<br>
<b>X(38227) = X(3)-4*X(14693) = X(4)+2*X(187) = 4*X(5)-X(316) = 2*X(5)+X(2080) = X(15)+2*X(7685) = X(16)+2*X(7684) = X(23)+2*X(16188) = X(98)-4*X(230) = X(98)+2*X(1513) = X(99)-4*X(37459) = 2*X(114)+X(385) = 2*X(115)+X(11676) = 4*X(140)-X(35002) = 2*X(230)+X(1513) = 2*X(237)+X(34175) = X(316)+2*X(2080) = X(325)-4*X(10011) = 4*X(468)-X(842) = 3*X(26613)-2*X(38225) = 3*X(26613)-4*X(38230)</b>
<p>X(38227) lies on these lines: {2,51}, {3,7790}, {4,187}, {5,316}, {15,7685}, {16,7684}, {22,32762}, {23,137}, {30,9166}, {32,37446}, {76,37466}, {83,20576}, {98,230}, {99,37459}, {107,468}, {114,385}, {115,11676}, {140,7859}, {182,7806}, {183,37071}, {237,34175}, {325,10011}, {381,8860}, {383,5479}, {419,35282}, {515,38221}, {524,23234}, {542,8859}, {546,38228}, {547,31168}, {576,7777}, {625,3090}, {631,7834}, {671,37461}, {691,11799}, {754,36519}, {946,5184}, {1080,5478}, {1348,1380}, {1349,1379}, {1352,17008}, {1570,7736}, {1656,3096}, {1692,7735}, {2021,3767}, {2030,6776}, {2076,9993}, {2456,7792}, {2459,6560}, {2460,6561}, {2782,14568}, {2794,21445}, {3054,5104}, {3055,7608}, {3085,5148}, {3086,5194}, {3089,5140}, {3091,13449}, {3095,7769}, {3523,7932}, {3524,5215}, {3545,3849}, {3564,6054}, {3628,7944}, {3788,12251}, {3815,5111}, {3972,37348}, {5025,5171}, {5031,15271}, {5067,31275}, {5071,31173}, {5093,11163}, {5102,11184}, {5162,7749}, {5188,7886}, {5207,34229}, {5305,32467}, {5309,7709}, {5475,10631}, {5999,6036}, {6055,29012}, {6671,14539}, {6672,14538}, {6721,7925}, {7610,10516}, {7612,14458}, {7753,22521}, {7771,37242}, {7797,13334}, {7799,15561}, {7813,20399}, {7817,21163}, {7827,11171}, {7844,8722}, {7907,9737}, {8724,11054}, {9734,33274}, {9755,35006}, {9774,25406}, {9855,9880}, {10358,16921}, {10753,15993}, {11668,14484}, {11669,14494}, {11674,31850}, {11675,18322}, {11811,37353}, {12117,27088}, {13172,32456}, {13586,23698}, {13862,17004}, {14041,23514}, {14061,15980}, {14236,26331}, {14240,26330}, {15514,31489}, {16984,37455}, {17006,19130}, {21166,35297}, {21167,37450}</p>
<p>
X(38227) = reflection of X(i) in X(j) for these (i,j): (2456, 38110), (3524, 5215), (7799, 15561), (14041, 23514), (14912, 1692), (21166, 35297), (38225, 38230)<br>
X(38227) = orthoptic circle of Steiner inellipse-inverse of-X(51)<br>
X(38227) = crosspoint of X(98) and X(7608)<br>
X(38227) = crosssum of X(511) and X(575)<br>
X(38227) = centroid of X(4)PU(2)<br>
X(38227) = {X(i),X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (2, 9752, 9753), (2, 9753, 262), (5, 2080, 316), (230, 1513, 98), (3091, 14712, 13449), (9752, 9754, 262), (9753, 9754, 2), (38225, 38230, 26613)<br>
</p>
